ðŸ“– Summary: BrowserOS is an open-source Chromium-based browser that natively supports AI agents. It emphasizes user privacy by allowing users to use their own API keys or run local models, ensuring data remains on the user's computer. It aims to provide a familiar browsing experience with integrated AI capabilities.
